title: your browser is being controled by your organization
content: I am not part of an organization. Despite that, my browser is being controlled by an organization and I cannot control how my browser operates. I have uninstalled and reinstalled Firefox several times to try to eliminate this issue and it keeps returning. There seems to be a certificate associated with this problem. "ImportEnterpriseRoots" How do I get rid of this problem permanently?
creator: cn8enred74

title: Firefox Data Gone Suddenly
content:
Hello,

So I turned on my computer and then opened FireFox and then all my important data is gone. My bookmarks and my passwords just vanished. I've used the same browser for years and have never had an issue until now. It's sucks cause there is years worth of information gone. I tried to load my information form an "Old Firefox data" folder but it has been no luck so far. I am desperately trying to get my information back to the way it was.
creator: redpenny47

title: irefox detected an issue and did not continue to khulna.land.gov.bd.
content:
irefox detected an issue and did not continue to khulna.land.gov.bd. The website is either misconfigured or your computer clock is set to the wrong time.

It’s likely the website’s certificate is expired, which prevents Firefox from connecting securely.

What can you do about it?

khulna.land.gov.bd has a security policy called HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS), which means that Firefox can only connect to it securely. You can’t add an exception to visit this site.

The issue is most likely with the website, and there is nothing you can do to resolve it. You can notify the website’s administrator about the problem.
creator: farukahamedbejoy35

title: FIREFOX SEARCH FOR UPDATES IN EVERY 5 MIN , BROWSING NOT WORK
content: firefox searches for updates every 5 minutes, and this takes 5 minutes, browsing does not work during this time

title: Firefox is default.  "search with GOogle" shows up
content: I just downloaded Firefox and designated it as my default browser. The purpose was to get away from using Google Chrome; however, when I go into Firefox, the only options are to search with google????? Please let me know if this can be corrected.
creator: luchsingerlois

title: Cookies Website Logins Constantly Removed.
content:
No I don't have "delete cookies when Firefox is closed" enabled.

I had two power outages in a row and ever since then every time i close Firefox it removes every single login I had saved even though it keeps the 3GB of cookie data still. I have to copy over an old backup that I luckily had in the Firefox files thanks to Firefox itself creating a backup. Still every single time I close this god forsaken browser I get logged out of every single thing. What am I supposed to do leave my PC running 24/7 without ever closing a browser? Every other basic solution that you can instantly find upon googling something similar to the topic title I already tried so don't bother writing it here, such as "uncheck the delete cookies box" well that doesn't do anything when its unchecked but still deletes everything does it. Bug fix?
creator: FireForgetFox
